item.title: CVE-2021-36872|2024-09-16T17:39:00.863Z -- hector%20cabrera -- wordpress%20popular%20posts
item.description: Authenticated Persistent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WordPress Popular Posts plugin (versions <= 5.3.3). Vulnerable at &widget-wpp[2][post_type].
